name: Small Bomb
description: A pinecone-sized metal ball filled with gunpowder. When lit, spend 1 AP to throw within 5 spaces of you. Any creature within 1 space of the space you chose must make a DC 13 Dexterity save or take 3 Piercing damage, half on a successful save.

name: Matchbox
description: A box of matches. 5 charges, expend a charge and 1 AP to light a match.

name: Bomb
description: A cannonball-sized metal ball filled with gunpowder and metal shards. When lit spend 1 AP to throw/roll this bomb. The distance it can be rolled/thrown is equal to your Might + 3. This bomb explodes at the end of the thrower's next turn. Any creature within 5 spaces of the explosion must make a DC 15 Physical save or take 5 points of Piercing/Sonic damage, plus an additional point of damage for each degree of failure. Half damage on a successful save.
